name: La Quinta Inn & Suites San Antonio Downtown

reviews.text: We arrived just after midnight and were warmly welcomed by the desk staff. Our room was large, clean with sofa bed made up. The breakfast was a little limited in choice, however quality was good. All staff were pleasant and helpful particulary the barman. The complementary drinks and snacks in the evening was a nice touch.
reviews.title: Excellent value for money
Great Hotel!!!!!!!!
reviews.text: The pool could get a little busy in the early evening, but quietened down later. Woodfield Suites is around 20 minutes walk from the Alamo and Rivercentre Mall, however a trolley passes outside the hotel if required.

aka: La Quinta Inn & Suites San Antonio Downtown Hotel
